tier.description: TIER 1/11 You find yourself thinking about Carter. Pay her a visit at Innsmouth Academy.

cinematic.line: You. I know you.
I mean, of course I know you, but it's something else...
My dream! You're the man of my dream!
My dream! You're the woman of my dream!
Wait! That didn't come out right.
You were in my dream last night...
Or were you? So hard to remember...
Montag: Recalling a dream is not unlike grasping at the ghost of a former lover,
sacrificed by your own hand in the heat of passion.
Montag: ... in a manner of speaking.
Carter: Gee, thanks for that Professor Creepshow.
Annabel: I think what Mr. Montag is trying to say is that it is possible to recount a dream,
but it may require some effort.
Isn't that right, H.J.?
Montag: Yes, yes... of course.
Annabel: Perhaps if you start from the beginning?
Carter: Well, let me think...
I was at the skate park with Danny...

tier.description: TIER 2/11 Go see Danny at the skate park in Kingsmouth.
TIER 2/11 Carter talked to Danny face-to-face. Stand near the barrel to continue recounting her dream.

cinematic.line: I was at the skate park with Danny.
We were talking... joking... laughing.
It must have been before everything went wrong... before the fog.
Katana Guy and Headphones Girl in full effect!
If you had been standing over my bed at that moment, you'd have seen a big smile on my face.
Danny: Hey! You changed your hair.
Carter: It's about time you noticed, you dope!
Danny: Come on, I noticed! How could I miss it?
I was just waiting for the right moment.
It looks awesome!
Carter: Thanks! Consider it my own personal brand of rebellion.
Danny: Look out, world!
Hey, speaking of the right moment... I've been meaning to ask you something.
Carter: Oh?
Danny: Yeah, but it's kinda awkward.
Carter: You know you can ask me anything.
Danny: Uhm...
Carter: Yes, Danny?
Danny: Well... kids at school have been talking about this thing...
"Friends with Benefits"
Have you heard of it?
Of all the things he could have asked me, I did not expect that!
I mean... Friends with Benefits?
I was shocked... stunned... speechless.
Then, before I could even think about what to say, he started laughing...
at me!
Because I wasn't wearing any pants!
It's a dream! Clothing can go missing at any time!
And if you want to get into someone's pants, you shouldn't laugh when they come off!
I was definitely no longer smiling in my bed!
Thoroughly humiliated, I ran out of there crying and went to the church.

tier.description: TIER 3/11 Follow Carter's tracks to the church.
TIER 3/11 Carter continues recounting the dream.

dialog.line: When I got to the steps the church... Danny was there... he was different.
He had a look in his eyes, a hunger.
Then he attacked me! I had no choice!

tier.description: TIER 3/11 Kill Danny. (If you can't find Danny nearby, then kill a Returned Townie zombie.)
TIER 3/11 Go in the church to see Reverend Hawthorne.
TIER 3/11 Carter continues recounting the dream.

dialog.line: As angry as I was at Danny, the thought of killing him...
Rev. Hawthorne: Perhaps this will raise your spirits, child.
He handed me a flyer for "Ladies and Gentlemen's Night" in London.
Not exactly what you'd expect from your local minister.
The next thing I knew, I was there, standing in the bar...

tier.description: Reverend Hawthorned handed you a flyer. Go the bar shown in the flyer.
TIER 4/11 Go to the bar shown in the flyer.
TIER 4/11 Go to the bar shown in the flyer.

cinematic.description: Eve body delayed to prevent hair color change

cinematic.line: The next thing I knew, I was there, standing in the bar.
I guess sex was on the brain.
First "Friends with Benefits" and now this.
A night to remember, and I dressed the part.
I wandered over to a dark corner and talked to "Eve".

tier.description: TIER 4/11 Talk to Eve near the stairs.

cinematic.description: Eve body delayed to prevent hair color change

cinematic.line: Eve: Welcome to the Garden of Eve.
Can I interest you in any fruit?
Carter: Um...
Eve: Perhaps Adam is more to your taste, then?
Carter: I...
Eve: You are the Perfect Gentleman, aren't you?
No worries, there is always time to turn over a new leaf.
I bet you like to Sextus, hmmmm?
Carter: To what?
Gentleman: I said... Would you like me to get you a Sextus?

cinematic.description: Carter Nude Male (female model forces male head)

cinematic.line: Bar Patrons: Sextus!!!
Carter: Ah!
Suddenly, I was the "Entertainment".
Nude entertainment!
Have I mentioned how much I hate dreams!
A blink later...
I found myself standing in the lobby of a hotel. A very strange hotel.

tier.description: TIER 5/11 Follow Carter's footsteps and continue the dream.
TIER 5/11 Follow Carter's footsteps and continue the dream.

cinematic.line: This hotel...
I was certain I'd never been here before, but it was also strangely familiar.
Like a long forgotten dream on the edge of memory.
I laid in the bed for what must have been hours...
or was it only seconds?
Dreamtime is hard to interpret, ya know?
I dozed off and started to dream.
A dream within a dream, just like in the movies.
A stream of familiar voices flowed into the unconciousness...
There's something down there.
They will that whisper...
My gifts allow me to protect myself and this playground.
Something old.
Something terrifying.
Loneliness is just craving for something containing nought but empty calories.
There are only two things worse than an empty canvas: death and taxes.
I should very much like my teddy now.
Then the voices stopped, and I looked around.
I was surrounded by bright lights and big city, black ooze dripping from the buildings.
Standing outside a restaurant, I smelled sushi...

tier.description: TIER 6/11 Go to the next location in Carter's dream.

cinematic.line: I was surrounded by bright lights and big city...
black ooze dripping from the buildings.
Standing outside a restaurant, I smelled sushi...
but I tasted... milk and sugar?
And I heard music... really cool music.
Some kind of monster dropped from one of the buildings.
Instead of running away, I ran towards it...
and used my super powers to strike it down, Headphones Girl style!
I was such a badass!
That's when I realized I was not myself.
I was someone else.
Someone like you.

tier.description: TIER 6/11 Hunt down and kill Hounds of Jingoku.
TIER 7/11 Carter continues recounting the dream.

dialog.line: I struck down the last beast, then I was myself again.
I was standing on a playground in front of a little boy.
I know this boy. I've seen him in my visions, or whatever you wanna call them.
He's, for lack of a better word, a friend.

tier.description: TIER 7/11 Find the little boy on the playground.
TIER 7/11 Stand near the see-saw facing the little boy.

cinematic.line: Jung: Have you come again?
I like it when you visit.
You dont see me as the others do.
You are not afraid.
Perhaps I should not be afraid.
Perhaps I should not hide.
Perhaps you are afraid now?
Perhaps you should be.
Dark days have descended upon us, and darker days are ahead still.
Even I may yet succumb to the darkness and mindlessly...
or worse, mindfully
ravage those that cling to light.
Its a sad state of affairs we find ourselves in.
There is hope.
Snow mountains a cave a little girl?
"Once more unto the breach..."
Please do visit again.

tier.description: TIER 8/11 Jung spoke of a cave in the snowy mountains. Find the next location in Carter's dream.

cinematic.line: It must have been beautiful.
I wouldn't know.
I was down below, deep in a chasm, shivering in the cold.
This was no ordinary cave.
It was like someone opened up the sky, and I could almost touch it.
Maybe I could touch it.
Yes, I had to touch it.
But first, something else had to be done.
Something else was more pressing.
I had to find...
my teddy.

tier.description: TIER 8/11 Venture forth into the breach.

cinematic.line: I stood on the ledge and peered into the opening.
It was like the universe, even time itself, was unfolded before my eyes.
Something had been breached.
The sky? The space-time continuum? Reality?
I don't know what it was.
Somehow, I knew that I - the little girl - had caused all of this.
A strange cube floated in the air.
I heard a voice come out of it.
Voice: Little one...
Emma: Do you have my teddy?
Voice: Little one, you have forgotten yourself.
You will remember.
You always do.
It will be too late.
We are waking.
You will not contain us this time.
This time, we shall be free.
Just like that, she was gone, and I was back.
Standing on the ledge, I knew what I had to do next.
I don't know why I jumped.
It just felt like the right thing to do.
Youre supposed to wake up after a big fall like that, but I didnt.
I could see myself just lying there... lifeless.
I was dead
and then I wasnt.

tier.description: TIER 10/11 In her dream, Carter was resurrected at the Repentance Cavern Anima Well. Go there to continue the dream.

cinematic.line: When I revived, I wasnt myself anymore.
I didnt know who I was.
It was the weirdest feeling
I recognized the presence, but I couldnt place it.
Not until now.
Now, I know.
It was you.
For a while, I just stood there in my anonymity...
basking in the light that surrounded me.
Then, I started to cry.

tier.description: TIER 11/11 Return to Carter at Innsmouth Academy.

cinematic.line: Talk about a weird dream, huh?
One minute youre having a normal dream, sans pants...
and the next youre in another world.
You felt it too, didnt you? The dream?
Its why you came here today.
I'm glad.
Listen... about the crying...
It's just... It was something I hadnt felt in a long, long time.
Something about your presence was calming.
I had no fear.
I eventually stopped crying and slept soundly until morning.
No screams in the middle of the night, no nosebleeds, just a few hours of relief.
Thank you for that.
Please do visit my dreams again.
